      static void waitlistReplay(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> recived, ConnectionToClient client)
      array list of object that contains: [0] -> string "waitlistReplay" [1] -> Boolean true if the order is now in place false if something went wrong. if the client say "no", an empty message will be sent to the client - ergo: nothing in cell [1].
